feat: add calculation groups and field parameters support

NAMEOF\(\) references from TMDL. Build dependency graph nodes for both
types with proper edge wiring. Update impact analysis display with
new downstream sections, lineage view with distinct colors \(teal for
calc groups, warm orange for field params\), and refactoring engine
to update NAMEOF\(\) references in partition expressions on rename.

Closes #31

EOF
\)")

Bash(gh issue create --title "[P1] Impact analysis error silently swallowed" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Bug

**File:** `app.js:934-937`

When `result.error` is truthy in `displayImpactResults\(\)`, the error is only `console.error\(\)`''d. The placeholder is already hidden, so the user sees an empty/stale results area with no indication that analysis failed.

## Severity
**Critical** â€” users get zero feedback on failure

## Fix
Add `showError\(\)` call to display the error to the user before returning.

## Found in
Code review cycle 3
EOF
\)" --label "bug,cycle-3")

Bash(git -C "D:/worktrees/task-3-1-p2-bugfixes" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: wire up dead validateChanges\(\), move banner styles to CSS, record delete analyses in session history

- Call validateChanges\(\) in applyChanges\(\) to guard against duplicate
  changes before modifying files \(#40\)
- Replace 7 Object.assign inline style blocks in 4 notification/banner
  functions with CSS classes using custom properties \(#41\)
- Add sessionManager.addRecentAnalysis\(\) call for delete operations so
  they appear in Quick Access panel \(#42\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
